A seasonable caveat against the dangers of credulity in our trusting the spirits before we try them delivered in a sermon before the King at White-Hall on the first Sunday in February, 1678/9 / by Thomas Pierce ... ; published by His Majesties especial command. Pierce, Thomas, 1622-1691.
[2], 38 p.
Printed by E.F. for R. Davis ..., London : MDCLXXIX [1679]
Running title: Of trying the spirits before we trust them. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Includes bibliographical references.
